name: Burger Boy
description:
First time ever LD participation and the first game for our small team.

We more or less used this to try and make a game for the very first time and
learn something along the way. Really looking forward to any kind of feedback.

*Theme*
We tried to go for Turnbase vs. Racing, but somehow ended up with a turnbased collectable racer (? is that even a genre).

*Game*
The game is 1v1 turn based. Goal is to collect as many fastfood objects as possible.
You have 5 Seconds to decide on your moves. After a certain amount of rounds the one with the most points wins.

*Controls*
Just click the onscreen controls to move the current players car around.

*Team*
3D Models, Texturs & Look: Kiki, Max
Coding: Mario, Ben
